overview: The three-season series Poyraz Karayel will face fans of this film after the impressive finale. Osman Tasçi undertakes the directorship of the film "Poyraz Karayel: Global Capital", where Celil Nalçakan, Emel Çölgeçen, Musa Uzunlar and Cem Cücenoglu are among the most popular directors of the series.
title: Poyraz Karayel: Küresel Sermaye
